results.definition: out of the way (especially away from one's thoughts)
placed or kept separate and distinct as for a purpose
examples: a day set aside for relaxing

results.definition: not taken into account or excluded from consideration
examples: all joking aside, I think you're crazy

results.definition: in reserve; not for immediate use
examples: started setting aside money to buy a car

results.definition: a message that departs from the main subject
a line spoken by an actor to the audience but not intended for others on the stage
